n = int(input())
t = input()

s = [""] * n

# Reverse the string
print(t)
t = t[::-1]

for i in reversed(range(1, n + 1)):
    if n % i == 0:
        # Reverse the substring
        t = t[:i][::-1] + t[i:][::-1]
        print(t)

print(t)


def find_gcd(n):
   for i in range(n,0,-1):
       if n%i == 0:
           return i

def main():
    n = int(input())
    t = input()
    d = find_gcd(n)
    print(t[d:], end=" ")
    print(t[:d][::-1], end=" ")

main()


def find_gcd(n):
   for i in range(n,0,-1):
       if n%i == 0:
           return i

def main():
    n = int(input())
    t = input()
    d = find_gcd(n)
    print(t[d:])
    print(t[:d][::-1])

main()


def s(n): # returns the number of characters in the first line
   for i in range(n, 0, -1):
       if n%i == 0:
           return i

def main():
    n = int(input())
    t = input()
    d = s(n)
    print(t[d:], end="") # prints the second line
    print(t[:d][::-1], end="") # prints the first line in reverse order

main()


def s(n): # returns the number of characters in the first line
   for i in range(n,0,-1):
       if n%i == 0:
           return i

def main():
    n = int(input())
    t = input()
    d = s(n)
    print(t[d:]) # prints the second line
    print(t[:d][::-1]) # prints the first line in reverse order

main()


n = int(input())
t = input()

# Reverse the string
t = t[::-1]

for i in reversed(range(1, n + 1)):
    if n % i == 0:
        # Reverse the substring
        t = t[:i][::-1] + t[i:]

print(t)
